front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Low-Rate Wireless Personal Area Networks (WPANs)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: IEEE Std 802.15.4-2015 defines the protocol and compatible interconnection for data communication devices using low-data-rate, low-power, and low-complexity short-range radio frequency (RF) transmissions in a wireless personal area network (WPAN). A variety of physical layers (PHYs) have been defined that cover a wide variety of frequency bands.
